About Me

Front End Developer

Your Project is in safe hands


A certified Full Stack Web Developer from Southern Methodist University specializing in Front End Web Development. Holds 15 years’ experience working for distinguished companies, such as AT&T, Experian, and Hilton Hotels. Continuously, learning new coding languages in Udemy, such as JavaScript, Angular, and Python. Well-versed in web development using various languages and tools like HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, JavaScript, JQuery, Firebase, Node.js, MySQL, Express, Handlebars.js, and React.js. Fully Bilingual in English and Spanish.


I was born and raised in Puerto Rico. Went to the Inter American University of Puerto Rico, where I finished my Bachelor's Degree in Entrepreneurial Development and Management. Moved to Dallas, TX in 2013, currently living in Princeton, TX. I'm a husband and a father of two boys. I'm excited I can make a difference in someone's life, let me design your website.

Recommendations

Take a look at what my colleagues say...

Jose Torres impressed me with his ability to understand a position, articulate this back, and then provide boundless energy and drive to achieve a positive outcome. Jose has an infectious energy and can quickly integrate himself into the team, an attribute that should never be underestimated. He is also supportive and a great person to have in your corner.

  • Micah Crain, Texas

Jose and I have worked in corresponding roles for a few years. He excels in adapting to change, has shown his hard work through his dedication to his role and is a team player who looks out for everyone's success. His positive out look with added humor into his team dynamic is an asset to any team.

  • Megan Chatelain, Texas

Jose and I worked closely together during our preparation as Full Stack Web Developers. Very knowledgeable and resourceful in his affinity with Front-end coding. Completely determined to get the job done, he's proven valuable in group projects countless times. His attention to the details have made all the difference when designing a Web Page. A social disposition and willingness to learn make Jose a great asset in whatever endeavor he puts his mind to.

  • Onix Castro, Texas

I was thoroughly impressed by Jose’s performance in the Web Development boot camp he took through SMU. Not only was he able to master the tech skills in a short period of time, but he remained dedicated, committed, and showed a positive “can-do” attitude throughout the course. Learning to code isn’t about memorizing syntax and copy/pasting code snippets. It’s about being adaptable enough to change your mentality and learn something new and Jose was able to do exactly that. He’s hard-working, passionate, and sharp as a tac and I can’t recommend him enough.

  • Stephanie Workman, Texas
